    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceChatEventLog
    The message is from a chat event log.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceChatHistory
    The message is from a chat history.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceChatList
    The message is from a chat list or a forum topic list.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceDirectMessagesChatTopicHistory
    The message is from history of a topic in a channel direct messages chat administered by the current user.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceForumTopicHistory
    The message is from history of a forum topic.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceHistoryPreview
    The message is from chat, message thread or forum topic history preview.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceMessageThreadHistory
    The message is from history of a message thread.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceNotification
    The message is from a notification.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceOther
    The message is from some other source.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceScreenshot
    The message was screenshotted; the source must be used only if the message content was visible during the screenshot.
    static class 
    TdApi.MessageSourceSearch
    The message is from search results, including file downloads, local file list, outgoing document messages, calendar.
